channel.title: Pi npc teleport!
channel.description: Ok, soo. Does anyone know how to make a npc teleport itself? Like i set a random, and npc 1 teleports itself to random coords withing 10x 10y?

item.title: Pi npc teleport!
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

rrooaarr:

u may be able to set this up, but i think youd have to set up a npcteleport function and then loop it. it could take a while, but props to u if u do it

Yeah, im working on a very advanced nomad system. Soo far he does 7 different attacks, and will randomly spawn a jungle demon to help himself out, but it checks to see if the jungle demon has already been spawned, soo you dont get 10 in one battle. Now im just working on making him stun the surrounding players, than teleport across the room. I think maybe i could just simply force a teleport gfx on the npc, than somehow move it? Idk i would really like some help here

Read full topic
